originalText.text: Dr. Fitzsimmons is professional, intuitive and deeply knowledgeable. He eagerly diagnosis the issue and is resilient n enthusiastic to find a solution which brings both comfort and confidence that you are in excellent hands. Lloyd

text.text: Dr. Fitzsimmons is professional, intuitive and deeply knowledgeable. He eagerly diagnosis the issue and is resilient n enthusiastic to find a solution which brings both comfort and confidence that you are in excellent hands. Lloyd

originalText.text: Dr. Fitzsimmons is a great doctor. I have seen him on numerous occasions for sport related injuries and he has been very helpful in determining the best course of treatment. I’ve never once felt rushed in the treatment room and his staff are very kind. Would highly recommend and have to many of my friends.

text.text: Dr. Fitzsimmons is a great doctor. I have seen him on numerous occasions for sport related injuries and he has been very helpful in determining the best course of treatment. I’ve never once felt rushed in the treatment room and his staff are very kind. Would highly recommend and have to many of my friends.

originalText.text: Not only did Dr.  Fitzsimmons accurately diagnose me over a video visit before imaging, but his care has been outstanding and compassionate.   He is thorough and so attentive.  His staff has been wonderful too, and together they made accessing care during a pandemic seamless.  He is the best.

text.text: Not only did Dr.  Fitzsimmons accurately diagnose me over a video visit before imaging, but his care has been outstanding and compassionate.   He is thorough and so attentive.  His staff has been wonderful too, and together they made accessing care during a pandemic seamless.  He is the best.

originalText.text: Dr.Fitzsimmons was great! He was able to fit me into the schedule quickly and was very friendly and knowledgeable. Luckily my issue was minor and I only needed one visit but would definitely go to him in the future!

text.text: Dr.Fitzsimmons was great! He was able to fit me into the schedule quickly and was very friendly and knowledgeable. Luckily my issue was minor and I only needed one visit but would definitely go to him in the future!

originalText.text: I've recommended many friends, colleagues, and teammates to Dr. Fitzsimmons - he is an excellent physician with the greatest bedside manner.  He is extremely thorough during his examinations and relatively conservative in treatment, which is hard to come by in NYC these days. His office has always been prompt with scheduling my appointments whether emergencies or follow-ups and my test results were always reviewed without my having to call to hunt for results.  Would definitely recommend him 100 times over.
